name: Reprobel
membership: International Federation of Reproduction Rights Organisations (IFRRO)
goal: Reprobel is the Belgian central collective management organisation (CMO) for the collection and distribution of author & publisher remuneration rights in the field of reprography, education/research and public lending on the Belgian territory. Reprobel is cooperative company but with a non-for-profit goal and a legal collection monopoly. Reprobel is a full member of IFRRO.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Copyright (2001), collective rights management (2014) & DSM Directive
GDPR
